Āhāra Sutta：1. āhāra Sutta.-Preached at Jetavana on the four sustenances （āhārā） that maintain beings by bringing them to birth and keeping them after birth； also the cause of these sustenances and the method of their cessation. S.ii.11-12.



2. āhāra Sutta.-A group of suttas dealing with the food of the nīvaranas and of the bojjhangas，and with the condition that follows on the absence of their food. S.v.102-7.
